mapper.insert: insert into member (mid, mname, mpassword, menabled, mrole, memail) values(#{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpassword}, 1, 'ROLE_USER', #{memail})
mapper.select: select mid, mname, mpassword, menabled, mrole, memail from member where mid=#{mid}
mapper.update: update member set mpassword=#{mpassword}, memail=#{memail} where mid=#{mid}
